alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond du Lac; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 10:04PM CDT until July 28 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Western Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1003 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rosendale to near Watertown to near Waterloo to near Deerfield, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, West Bend, Watertown, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Waupun, Mayville, Slinger, North Fond Du Lac, Kewaskum, Horicon, Juneau, Lomira, Campbellsport, Theresa, Hustisford, Oakfield, Rosendale, Iron Ridge, and Brandon. This includes the following Location Horicon Marsh. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
